ThunderCracker thinks about all he has went through on this planet....NOTHI=
NG!

ThunderCracker: Yep, I am coming with you!...

  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tu=
esday, May 08, 2001 3:15 PM
  Subject: Farewell to the Keepers!


  :::Giga=
tron/The Skyscorchers/Vulois::: 

  ::My Keepers have realized that their f=
ormer allies are not coming back.   
  They have been wandering, searching =
for someone to help them.  They soon come 
  upon the Chivtron base.  They =
cannot beleive thier eyes, when they see Vulois 
  standing outside:: 
  Wi=
ndrazor: Vulois?! But how? 
  Terradive: But you're- we thought you were- 
=
  Gigatron: Dead! 
  ::Vulois turns around and sees his old comrades.  They=
 looked different, but 
  he recognized them:: 
  Vulois: I actually faked =
death so i could be free of the war.  It didn't 
  work.  Battera and Dacha=
nde are never coming back. 
  Afterburner: We are in the same situation.  H=
erald and the others are gone 
  for good. 
  Vulois: im sad to hear that t=
hey have departed.  But i think it's time we 
  left, too. 
  ::They see th=
at Thundercracker is with him:: 
  Terradive: Who's this? 
  Vulois: This i=
s my friend Thundercracker.  Thundercracker, these are my old 
  friends.  =
They are leaving the planet.  Ive decided im going to.  I would be 
  honor=
ed to have you join us.  Will you escape the war with us? 
  Your use of Ya=
hoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
